title: Chinese steamed buns
ingredients: ['225g chopped pork', '1 small tin prawns, drained and chopped (optional)', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 spring onions, chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped root ginger', '1 tablespoon light soy sauce', '1 tablespoon rice wine', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon sugar', 'black pepper to taste', '2 1/2 tablespoons water', '1 recipe Hom bao']
